CarePreauthItem.name: CarePreauthItem
CarePreauthItem.description: Represents the details of items included in a preauthorization for care under a member’s plan.

CarePreauthId.description: The ID of the care preauthorization this item details.

EndingServiceCode.description: The ending service code for the category of care being provided.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Laterality.description: The side of the body receiving care.

Name.description: Name of this preauthorized care item.

Notes.description: Notes about this preauthorized care item.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PreauthitemSequence.description: Sequence of this item among the preauthorized care items.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the system this preauthorization record was obtained from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this preauthorization record on its source system.

SourceSystemModified.description: The date on which this preauthorization was last changed on its source system.

StartingServiceCode.description: The starting service code for the category of care being provided.

Unit.description: Units by which the preauthorized quantity is measured.
